ygData.subject: RE: Purity belt... *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you sure he con d green? I don t know the level of your friend, but Kizdean Gix con d yellow to me at 22 or so. Maybe your friend accidentally con d a
ygData.messageBody:
> Me (15) and my Pallidin friend (22) attacked Kisdean Gix DEF in West
> Commonlands. He conned green to my friend. I had a dirk and my friend had 2h
> combine. Neither one of us hit for more than dmg 2 while Gix was laying

> Sylly
> Bard of the 15th level
> a.k.a. Robo-Bard
> camped out somewhere on Innoruuk

Are you sure he con'd green? I don't know the level of your friend, but
Kizdean Gix con'd yellow to me at 22 or so.

Maybe your friend accidentally con'd a kodiak or something.
